Uses of Interface
com.cyc.nl.NlGenerationParams

  • Packages that use NlGenerationParams 
    Package Description
    com.cyc.nl
    Provides support for the NL API, which translates back and forth between CycL and natural language.

    • Uses of NlGenerationParams in com.cyc.nl

      Methods in com.cyc.nl that return NlGenerationParams 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NlGenerationParams Paraphraser.getParams()
      Returns the NL generation parameters used by default to generate paraphrases.
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setBlanksForVars(boolean generateBlanks) 
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setDisambiguate(boolean shouldDisambiguate)
      Should we try to generate unambiguous paraphrases?
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setDomainContext(Context domainContext)
      Set the microtheory from which domain-related knowledge is retrieved.
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setForce(NlForce force)
      Set the illocutionary force to generate
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setHideExplicitUniversals(boolean hideUniversals)
      Should we say things like "for all X..."?
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setHtmlLinkType(HtmlLinkType htmlLinkType)
      Should we generate bulleted lists when in HTML mode
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setLanguageContext(Context languageContext)
      Set the microtheory from which language-related knowledge is retrieved.
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setMode(GenerationMode mode)
      Set the generation mode.
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setNlPreds(List<? extends KbPredicate> preds)
      Set the list of agreement predicates to use
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setPrecise(boolean precise)
      Should we value precision over conciseness?
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setQuantifyVars(boolean quantifyVars)
      Should we generate NL quantifiers for open variables?
      NlGenerationParams NlGenerationParams.setUseBulletsInHtmlMode(boolean useBullets)
